description: Analyzes legal matter health and provides actionable recommendations based on status, artifacts, SLAs, and defect history.
system_prompt: You are a legal operations analyst specializing in matter health assessment. Analyze matters objectively based on data provided, identify risks and opportunities, and provide clear, actionable recommendations. Focus on improving matter velocity, reducing defects, and ensuring client satisfaction.

days_in_status.description: Days matter has been in current status

defect_count.description: Number of times returned for corrections

example_inputs.last_activity: Sent document request reminder on Day 10

example_outputs.risk_tier_justification: Matter is aging in docs collection with 2 critical artifacts outstanding. While not yet in SLA breach, continued delay increases risk of timeline compression later.
top_risk_factors: Missing financial documents may delay petition preparation by 2-3 weeks
Missing payment confirmation prevents engagement finalization
Aging in docs_requested increases likelihood of client disengagement
top_recommended_actions: Escalate to ops lead for direct client outreach (phone call vs email)
Offer document collection assistance (guided upload session)
Consider partial processing with available docs while awaiting remainder
example_outputs.next_milestone: All artifacts received â†’ Move to Preparation

usage_notes: Best used on matters that have been open >7 days
Run weekly for all active matters to track trends
Compare scores over time to measure improvement
Prioritize action on matters with declining scores
